Studium
Wikipedia de

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʃtuːdi̯ʊm/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Studium n (genitive Studiums, plural Studien)

  1. study (the act of studying in general)
  2. studies (higher education to get a degree at a university)
